data.text: @BeateJaegerMD @LongCovidCH I had covid. I am unvaccinated. I had my blood checked it looked normal. A friend of mine, who decided to take the shot, checked his blood too. It looked like your pictures.

@BeateJaegerMD Been trying to get someone to look at my blood under a microscope since 3 months into this when a musculoskeletal chest MRI showed my bone marrow had reconverted,then I knew it was vascular & I was suffocating without any proof of it.Still can't breathe well nearly 2 years later
@BeateJaegerMD Check out @extheramedical filter with heparin as a similar yet easier solution. EAU for Covid. Love to see comparison as both seem positive! Thanks for all you do Dr!
@monica_shelden @DRoccograndi @BeateJaegerMD It's a confusing process.   Thank you for the kind regards :)
@BeateJaegerMD Wow. Thank you. Your work gives me hope.
@quasar9uk @PhilOSo86839856 @BeateJaegerMD @shaun_qureshi I’m sorry you are suffering. You are not an adverse event but a human being seeking help. Don’t give up.
@Addaboubou @DRoccograndi @BeateJaegerMD So sorry about your son. Hope treatment will help him.

@ejungmeyer @DrGrahamLJ @BeateJaegerMD My symptoms post-vaccine: Elevated d-dimer, cutaneous vasculitis, splinter hemorrhages, bundle branch heart block, burst blood vessels, frequent nosebleeds, changes to leaking heart valves, TIA, headaches, negative precordial t-wave.
Hx: +anti-phosphatidylserine +anti-prothrombin
@PhilOSo86839856 @BeateJaegerMD @shaun_qureshi its 1 in 100,000 for stroke after pfizer according to scientific data
